comment.author: 60241917@N04
comment._content: These are all such amazing photos...how do you do it?

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content:
Bear in mind that we didn't take any of these photos. They are all very old photos by long dead photographers in the Keene NH area. We are just scanning them, cleaning them up, and posting them to Flickr Commons.
Thanks for your interest,
Keene Public Library, NH
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos
